name: The Gameshow Of The Multiverse - Prototype
name_original: The Gameshow Of The Multiverse - Prototype
description:
This Game Was Made In 48 Hours [Less If You Count All The Times I was Busy]

Controls:

- WSAD For Movement

- WSAD + Space Bar For Slow Movement 

Objective:

Survive 5 Mins. All You Have To Do Is Avoid The Red Tiles. The Colors Will Be Revealed Before They Activate. This Is Only A Prototype. 

Theme:

The Theme Was Limited Space.  In My Game, I Use The Theme In The Main Mechanic. Your Space Is Limited To The Green Tiles.
